features: 99% Water, Plant-based multi-tasking Wipes clean effectively while giving skin a little extra love
Naturally scented; Extra-large, thick + soft; Cruelty free; Dermatologist tested
Nourish + Cleanse: made with Jojoba + Almond Oil to nourish; Hydrate + Cleanse: made with Aloe + Cucumber to hydrate; Calm + Cleanse: made with Aloe + Lavender to promote calmness

Gentle and safe for Baby but great for the whole family
body.description: Infused with skin nourishing ingredients + natural fragrance, our 99% water, plant-based wipes clean effectively while giving skin a little extra love. Plus, they smell amazing! Use them for the whole fam — from gently cleansing your hands on-the-go or freshening up post-workout, to cleaning kiddos' messy faces, hands and tushies! Keep them in the car for sticky snacks, in your work out bag for a quick refresh, and in all the rooms of your home for easy access to these multitasking wipes we love!NOURISH + CLEANSE:Our Nourish + Cleanse wipes are made with jojoba + almond oil to nourish skin, and the dreamy natural sweet almond scent uplifts spirits.HYDRATE + CLEANSE:Our Hydrate + Cleanse wipes are made with aloe + cucumber to hydrate skin. The natural aloe water scent is light and gentle, sure to make your cleansing experience so refreshing!CALM + CLEANSE:Our Calm + Cleanse wipes are made with naturally derived lavender + aloe to bring serene vibes to you + babe. Perfect for use before naps, bedtime, or anytime the fam needs some calm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent as well as the texture of these wipes. The texture makes for truly easy clean up especially when it comes to baby stool. They are also very soft and moist enough without being overly wet. Was very gentle on both my baby’s and toddler’s skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of these wipes and they're gentle on baby skin. Win win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Why is 'seals well' a top consideration? Because i have lost too much money paying for 'convenient' containers/dispensers of moist towelettes that dry out and become useless as is. You get one towelette, and another comes out halfway. But there is ample room in the cap to close it inside. There is no drying out. The cap seals really well. To test this, i opened 2 of them. One to use and one to take one out and re-close. That one i put aside and didn't use for four months. Result? The top towel was just as moist and useable as the container i was currently using. Now, keeping it in the car during the summer when it is really hot, will not give you best results, you will loose some longevity, so I would not leave it in the car, but maybe a cooler part of the trunk and change it out every time you need a new one inside. That works for me. (temps don't get or maintain higher than 85deg F) They are big enough to get a job done and damp enough to do some good cleaning. And they do not leave a scent. I like that too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and delicate fragrance
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite brand of wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but WORTH IT
reviews.reviewText: I love, love, love these. I've used baby wipes, every brand. Nothing compares to these. Taking care of my 85 year old mom for the past 4 years, she's also had "accidents" and I've tried every brand of sensitive wipe on her. Some made her red and she actually said that they hurt, burned. What do they put in the other ones, the ones for the babies? I've used the other ones on my hands and they dried my hands out. My niece handed the "other brand" to my mom to wash her face, I didn't know why my mom's face was turning red. After a few days, her face was dried out and looked burned. Then I found out why. After that I was using bamboo wash clothes because they are soft, but that's a lot and laundry.Ok....so, I saw this on Amazon. I read reviews. I decided to give it a try. HONEST COMPANY. I bought a 3 pack box, 60 each pack in SWEET ALMOND. I used the first one on MY FACE; it felt soft and smelled so good, like almonds (or should I say an odor from my childhood, a lotion). These are sturdy, strong as I used the same one on my hands too. The best part, my face felt nourished and soft all day long (I'm 66 with dry skin).When it came to using it on my mom. She no longer complains, is red or in pain from wipes. They are so good, I give them for her face too. My MOM and a BABY deserves the best one can afford.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would not recommend using on the face
reviews.reviewText: My adult daughter has super sensitive skin especially on her face and used one of these because it's suppose to free of harsh things and her face immediately got all red and angry. I personally would not use these on a young child as their skin is also very fragile. I have no problems with this on my skin as I use these to freshen up in the hot GA summer and I am 51.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price is right
reviews.reviewText: Value for money smells good clean up well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've tried multiple brands, even multiple styles within the brand, and I've found this the best for our home. It's great for just cleaning the face & pits, taking off makeup, cleaning the dogs' eyes, you name it. Even used wipes, while still a bit damp, work great for cleaning the sink, vanity top or toilet seat!
